title: Sovereign Cigarettes Pack plus T206  SOLD

posts.post_title: Sovereign Cigarettes Pack plus T206  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Not sure if this is the exact year that held cards. Value is in the Sovereign Cigarette Pack (has that great 100+ yr old smell).  Including the T206 Sovereign Karger for free (beater, missing most of the back). Hard to price..based off Piedmont pack comps, start it at SOLD Or Best Offer. 
Please note, no cigarettes plus a small price of tape holding the top lid in place.
Thanks for Looking,
-Ryan

Cool item!!
